title: Monitoring, Alerts, and Reporting
subtitle: Creating and managing reports, feeds, and widgets in Red Hat CloudForms

abstract.para: This guide provides instructions for creating and managing reports, feeds, and widgets in Red Hat CloudForms. It also includes information on accessing usage and chargeback costs. This information supports better information technology decision making and predictions for future virtual machine management.

If you have a suggestion for improving this guide or have found an error, please submit a Bugzilla report at http://bugzilla.redhat.com against Red Hat CloudForms Management Engine for the Documentation component. Please provide specific details, such as the section number, guide name, and CloudForms version so we can easily locate the content.
